author: Tony Tobin
method: Heat the olive oil in a frying pan over a medium heat. Add the onion, garlic and chilli flakes and fry for 2-3 minutes, until softened. Add the halloumi and fry for 2-3 minutes, until golden. Add the finely chopped tomato, pasta and basil and stir together and warm through. To serve, place into a warm bowl and season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  ½ red onion, finely chopped,  1 clove garlic, chopped,  pinch dried chilli flakes,  100g/3½oz halloumi, cut into cubes,  2 tomatoes, seeds removed and finely chopped,  150g/5½oz penne pasta, cooked according to packet instructions,  2 tbsp chopped fresh basil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
